description: Lists available snapshots of a specified Neptune Analytics graph.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Pagination token used to paginate output. When this value is provided as input, the service returns results from where the previous response left off. When this value is present in output, it indicates that there are more results to retrieve.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The total number of records to return in the command's output. If the total number of records available is more than the value specified, nextToken is provided in the command's output. To resume pagination, provide the nextToken output value in the nextToken argument of a subsequent command. Do not use the nextToken response element directly outside of the Amazon CLI.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the graph snapshot.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The snapshot name. For example: my-snapshot-1.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the graph snapshot.

nested_items.name: sourceGraphId
nested_items.description: The graph identifier for the graph for which a snapshot is to be created.

nested_items.name: snapshotCreateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the snapshot was created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the graph snapshot.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key used to encrypt and decrypt the snapshot.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Pagination token used to paginate output.
